headline: Chipotle price target raised to $60 from $49 at Stephens
summary: Stephens analyst Jim Salera raised the firm’s price target on Chipotle (CMG) to $60 from $49 and keeps an Equal Weight rating on the shares. The firm adjusted targets in the restaurant group as part of a Q2 earnings preview. Sentiment regarding restaurants is more optimistic exiting Q2 compared to the beginning of the quarter, the analyst tells investors in a research note.
